card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

card.name: Auratog
card.property: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

card.name: Celestial Dawn
card.property: Lands you control are Plains. Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

card.name: Consecrate Land
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

card.name: Defiant Vanguard
card.property: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Enduring Renewal
card.property: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

card.name: Essence Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

card.name: Honorable Passage
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

card.name: Icatian Javelineers
card.property: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Moorish Cavalry
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Members of the elite Moorish Cavalry are very particular about their mounts, choosing only those whose bloodlines have been pure for generations.

card.name: Resurrection
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sacred Mesa
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." —"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

card.name: Soltari Priest
card.property: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse. Of his stature he was of evene lengthe. And wonderly delyvere, and of greete strengthe." —Geoffrey Chaucer, The Canterbury Tales

card.name: Valor
card.property: First strike As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land." —Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Witch Hunter
card.property: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Zhalfirin Commander
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Dandân
card.property: Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Catch good today. Start replacing crew tomorrow." —Faysal al-Mousa, fisher captain, log

card.name: Flying Men
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saffiyah clapped her hands and twenty flying men appeared at her side, each well trained in the art of combat.

card.name: Ghost Ship
card.property: Flying {U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below." —Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad

card.name: Giant Oyster
card.property: You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

card.name: Leviathan
card.property: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

card.name: Lord of Atlantis
card.property: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

card.name: Merfolk Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target creature with islandwalk.

card.name: Mistform Ultimus
card.property: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

card.name: Ovinomancer
card.property: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

card.name: Pirate Ship
card.property: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to any target. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

card.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
card.property: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally, members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

card.name: Psionic Blast
card.property: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

card.name: Sindbad
card.property: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

card.name: Stormscape Familiar
card.property: Flying White spells and black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Stormscape apprentice must hand-raise and train an owl before attaining the rank of master.

card.name: Unstable Mutation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Voidmage Prodigy
Whispers of the Muse
card.property: Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I followed her song only to find it was a dirge." —Crovax

card.name: Willbender
card.property: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.property: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Bad Moon
card.property: Black creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Conspiracy
card.property: As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Darkness
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, / And hug it in mine arms." —William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

card.name: Dauthi Slayer
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They have knives for every soul." —Lyna, Soltari emissary

card.name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
card.property: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack. Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

card.name: Faceless Butcher
card.property: When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher. When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Funeral Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target player discards a card. • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

card.name: Sengir Autocrat
card.property: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A thankless job, and a death sentence besides." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Shadow Guildmage
card.property: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library. {R}, {T}: Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To keep the dead so others may live. —Shadow Guild maxim

card.name: Soul Collector
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control. Morph {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Stupor
card.property: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. —Suq'Ata saying

card.name: Swamp Mosquito
card.property: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Uncle Istvan
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

card.name: Undead Warchief
card.property: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

card.name: Undertaker
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

card.name: Withered Wretch
card.property: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

card.name: Avalanche Riders
card.property: Haste Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power." —Jeska, warrior adept

card.name: Desolation Giant
card.property: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

card.name: Disintegrate
card.property: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Dragon Whelp
card.property: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dragonstorm
card.property: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Eron the Relentless
card.property: Haste {R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal." —Reyhan, Samite alchemist

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.property: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Fire Whip
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target." Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Goblin Snowman
card.property: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn. {T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strength in numbers? Right." —Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

card.name: Kobold Taskmaster
card.property: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common kobold.

card.name: Orcish Librarian
card.property: {R}, {T}: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Exile four of them at random, then put the rest on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Us hungry, need food . . . . Lots of books . . . . Hmm . . . ."

card.name: Orgg
card.property: Trample Orgg can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater. Orgg can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Pandemonium
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to any target of their choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!" —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Suq'Ata Lancer
card.property: Haste Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never stop 'til you see your lance come out the other side." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Tribal Flames
card.property: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is the universal language." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Uthden Troll
card.property: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere, Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near, Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear." —Troll chant

card.name: Wildfire Emissary
card.property: Protection from white {1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire." —Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

card.name: Avoid Fate
card.property: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

card.name: Call of the Herd
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cockatrice
card.property: Flying Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Craw Giant
card.property: Trample Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho! Midgets! You think you can stand in my way?"

card.name: Gaea's Blessing
card.property: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Gaea's Liege
card.property: As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls. {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Hail Storm
card.property: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home." —Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

card.name: Hunting Moa
card.property: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

card.name: Krosan Cloudscraper
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}. Morph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Scragnoth
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

card.name: Spike Feeder
card.property: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Spitting Slug
card.property: Whenever Spitting Slug blocks or becomes blocked, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target. When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
card.property: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.) Saproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1. When Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Wall of Roots
card.property: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

card.name: Whirling Dervish
card.property: Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Coalition Victory

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts." —Urza

card.name: Fiery Justice
card.property: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Target opponent gains 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fire of justice burns like nothing else." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace must prevail, even if the wicked must die."

card.name: Lightning Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance, haste

card.name: Merieke Ri Berit
card.property: Merieke Ri Berit doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Merieke Ri Berit. When Merieke Ri Berit leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Mystic Enforcer
card.property: Protection from black Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Enforcer gets +3/+3 and has flying.

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.property: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Nicol Bolas
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Whenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spined Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly; And if you get eaten, then no one will cry." —Mogg children's rhyme

card.name: Stormbind
card.property: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Teferi's Moat
card.property: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isolation is not the answer."—Urza, to Teferi

card.name: Vhati il-Dal
card.property: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati. "Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."

card.name: Void
card.property: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

card.name: Assault // Battery

alternate.name: Assault
alternate.property: Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

alternate.name: Battery
alternate.property: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Claws of Gix
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

card.name: Dodecapod
card.property: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Feldon's Cane
card.property: {T}, Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

card.name: Grinning Totem
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles their library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Mindless Automaton
card.property: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

card.name: Mirari
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It offers you what you want, not what you need." —Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: The Rack
card.property: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the rack was once his most feared creation.

card.name: Serrated Arrows
card.property: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.

card.name: War Barge
card.property: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves the battlefield this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. (A creature with islandwalk can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Arena
card.property: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Desert
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

card.name: Gemstone Mine
card.property: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

card.name: Pendelhaven
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . Stand like Druids of eld." —Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, "Evangeline"

card.name: Safe Haven
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control.
